tswitem.name: Signet of the Physician
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of the Physician
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you directly heal an ally who is within 50/100/150 metres, you heal them for an additional 50. This Signet can be attached to Minor Talismans. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
